content:
Packing a small toiletry bag with travel-sized essentials is a great idea! 

Absolutely, include a toothbrush and toothpaste in your toiletry bag! It's easy to forget these essential items, as you've experienced before. By packing them, you'll ensure that you have them when you need them.

In fact, consider packing a travel-sized toothbrush and toothpaste to save space and weight in your luggage. You can also look for toothpaste tablets or powder as an alternative to traditional toothpaste, which can be more compact and lightweight.

Here are some other items you may want to consider adding to your toiletry bag:

* Deodorant
* Razor and shaving cream (if applicable)
* Makeup and makeup remover (if applicable)
* Hairbrush or comb
* Contact lenses and solution (if applicable)
* Prescription medication and any necessary documentation
* Travel-sized skincare products (e.g., moisturizer, sunscreen)

Remember to check the TSA's website for any travel restrictions on toiletries and liquids before your trip.

By packing a well-stocked toiletry bag, you'll be prepared for your trip and avoid any last-minute purchases or inconvenience.
